title: Thunderbird has become very slow to connect to my gmail account mailboxes
content:
For the last three days Thunderbird has been very slow to open my Inbox, Sent Box, Bin, etc on my gmail account. (Other email accounts mailboxes are fast as usual). Gmail is my primary account. The spinning circle runs for quite a while (two or three minutes) as I attempt to open Inbox or Sent or Bin or whatever or move from one to another.

Sometimes when I empty the Bin and get the Emptied Bin confirmation, the cleared message reappears in the Bin again later.

Also I cannot now find either Options or Preferences within the Tools Menu (nor anywhere else either). Where is this now please ?

Any help would be much appreciated.
creator: joycembrett

title: Can't send email message - encrypted passwords not supported
content:
Hi good day,

I'm having trouble with my Thunderbird app as I can't seem to send a message/email. I've tried troubleshooting by configuring the SMTP settings.

Go to Account Settings like in the previous step. Click “Outgoing server” in the left-hand tab. Make sure you’re using the 587 port, “None” in connection security, and “Normal” password.

And the 1st image is the error I receive

title: Sfondo mail
content:
Non riesco a modificare sfondo mail. Ho chiesto aiuto qui. Molto gentilmente mi ha risposto NEXT, che ringrazio, scrivendomi:

""Quando componi un messaggio, nella barra degli strumenti di formattazione, ci sono due quadrati colorati di solito uno bianco sullo sfondo ed uno nero in primo piano. Facendo click su questo quadrati puoi cambiare il colore dello sfondo e del testo. Questo per il singolo messaggio.

Se vuoi usare lo stesso schema in tutti i messaggi vai in Tasto menu > Impostazioni > Composizione Togli il segno di spunta da Usa i colori predefiniti del lettore Poi immediatamente sotto personalizza i colori in Colore del testo e Colore di sfondo""

Ma il punto è che avevo già fatto passo passo quanto descritto da NEX, poi l'ho ripetuto, ma le impostazioni NON "rimangono" fisse, insomma NON si salvano!! Come fare?
creator: kingsun27

title: Google Contacts has stopped synchronising to Thunderbird
content:
I have been using Thunderbird address book synchronized to Google contacts but it has stopped synchronizing this summer. I had been able to find new contacts in contacts.google.com add a label then later I found that they had synchronized and were in my various instances of Thunderbird.

This was working fine in the winter this year. But I added a contact this way in the summer and the contact has not appeared in any instance of Thunderbird Address book.

I am using Thunderbird 102.14.0 with Windows 7 and 10. But Linux may be using an older version Ubuntu is on version 102.15.0. The issue seems to have arisen this summer.

I disabled a few years ago; TbSync, Cardbook, Google-4-TbSync, Provider-4-CALDAV & CARDDAV, when Thunderbird Address book started to work with Yahoo and Gmail address books.

The only add-on that I use now is LT for grammar and spell checking.

creator: dfreitas11

title: User interface suddenly changed, we're in distress
content:
We have 4 PCs at work. On one of them the whole Thunderbird interface changed. I tried to fix it, even re-install the whole thing but it's still broken. There's no button to create a new mail, no button to download new messages, the search bar glitched up and to the middle, EVERYTHING moved a bit more up and to the left leaving empty space on the right and even the logo is weird and looks like a completely different program!

It all looks off and so confusing, especially for my (much MUCH) older coworkers. For now we're just using other computers but I'm afraid that if it's an update and not a glitch it will reach others as well. Adobe Acrobat at least had a button you could click to get back to the old look but I can't find anything like that here...

I'm so frustrated, it's like 5th product/website in the last few months that gets broken like this... I don't want to be called constantly for every thing regarding e-mails. And on top of that I had to create an account here because just sending a bug report or even just feedback directly to people who work on the changes is not an option unless you just throw a post and hope another user answers it! Or idk, maybe there is such option but burried somewhere deep on this website.

Please help, I'm desperate...
creator: a_zero

title: Mozilla Thunderbird - Odeslat později
content:
Dobrý den, používám nejnovější verzi Thunderbirdu. Nainstaloval jsem si doplněk "Odeslat později". Při pokusu odeslat email později, je utomaticky nastaveno odeslat za 5 minut. Při změně datumu o tři dny později a zvolení " Dát do pošty k odeslání" vyskočí okno s textem

'Kliknutí na tlačítko „Dát do „Pošty k odeslání“ vloží zprávu okamžitě do vaší „Pošty k odeslání“, takže u ní NEBUDE naplánováno odeslání v určitý čas. Pro odeslání naplánovaném v určitý čas klikněte (po vložení platného času odeslání) na tlačítko „Odeslat přibližně v“ v zeleném rámečku. Opravdu chcete zprávu vložit do vaší „Pošty k odeslání?"

V poště k odeslání jsou emaily, ale ani u jednoho nejde kliknout na "Odeslat pozděj" a chybí tam "Odeslat přibližně". Doplněk je nefunkční.

title: Thunderbird - problem with printers
content: Hello all, I have the following problem with printing attachments in Thunderbird. For some attachments, it only displays 'save as PDF', even though I print without any problems in other programs. I think the problem started after updating TH to 102.15.0, I'm currently on 115.2.2. When this problem occurs in TH, I cannot print from other programs either, it does not display printers (Word, Adobe reader, Notepad). Messages to install the printer are displayed. When I reset the computer, all programs (except TH) print normally, until TH hangs with an attachment (interestingly, TH displays printers with a few attachments and suddenly stops with a random one). I uninstalled all printer drivers and TH itself, reset the print settings in TH, then installed TH and one printer, nothing helped. I can't go back to an older version of TH because after copying the profile files, TH won't start. I guess maybe a format would help, but I don't want to do it this way and I'm asking for some solutions. Thank you very much in advance!

title: how to click on link in Thunderbird event summary flyover
content:
I'm using Thunderbird 102.15.1, which was just upgraded to 115.2.2. In either version, if I have a calendar event with a link (e.g. `https://example.com/`), when I hover my mouse over that event on the calendar I can see the event description in a flyover. The event description shows the link, and it looks like the link is clickable, as it is underlined. But when I move the mouse to position the pointer over the flyover, the flyover disappears.

creator: garretwilson

title: Can no longer fetch mail from hotmail account
content:
Many years ago, I set up Thunderbird to use POP protocol to fetch and send email via my hotmail account (which I've also had for years). About two days ago, the fetching process hangs and eventually times out ... no new email is fetched. It is still possible to send email FROM my hotmail address ... so the outbound server seems to be working. It is also still the case that I can use webmail to access my hotmail account ( msn calls it an outlook acct now) to read incoming email .... the same old password I established still works for webmail. And yes, I know OAuth 2 key is needed for email client fetch .... that key was set and has been working for a long time too. Other details: - On fetch start, a brief window pops up and disappears so quickly I can't read it or respond if response is necessary... but it looks like the window presented when there's a problem with the password or other aspect of session start up. -I updated my iMac to the latest version of BigSur just before this started happening - but since that OS update, I do not have this problem with other email accounts for which I use POP protocol. -I am aware that MSN has "improved" its Outlook service ... anyone know if this has caused a widespread problem for Thunderbird users (or even other 3rd party client side apps)? -I have poked around in help in the online MSN Outlook support area, to no avail.

Can someone in the Mozilla community help me?
creator: dncollins

title: Need advice on setting up filters
content:
Hi, I've tried searching the help section but cannot find an answer to my specific filters problem,

I'm getting loads of scam emails from random domains, I have already created about 40 filters to block anything coming from domains like ".bond, .lat, .cam, .buzz, .casa" etc etc, rather than constantly adding to the blocked list I'm wondering how to setup an allowed list, I would only like to allow emails from domains ending in ".co.uk, .com, .net, .org" and to send all others to the junk folder, I never have anything that's useful from the other random sounding domains.

I have tried setting up filters using the terms "from" & "doesn't contain" and adding lines for each of the domains I do want to receive emails from, but when I run them I ended up with all emails getting sent to the junk folder.

It's probably a simple thing to do when you know how but so far it escapes me, can someone tell me how to allow emails from any ".com .co.uk .net & .org" domains and to block all the others?

Thanks,

title: Utilizing Mailchannels spam headers
content:
Many of my clients use email provided by a web hosting company which utilizes Mailchannels for email filtering. Mailchannels is a well-respected and widely used filtering service. ( https://www.mailchannels.com ) All incoming messages coming through the provider's servers are given Mailchannels spam-related headers. When setting up Thunderbird, there is an option to "Choose an external filter service in the drop-down menu" and "Trust junk mail headers set by:" - but Mailchannels does not seem to be one of the options.

Is there currently any way to set up Thunderbird to trust and utilize junk mail headers from Mailchannels?

If there is no preconfigured or standard way, can a user set up their own filter? Can any of the options in the "Apply filter when" {property} look at headers?

If Mailchannels is not currently one of the "Trust junk mail headers set by:" options, what would be the steps involved in trying to get Mailchannels officially added to the list?

Thanks for your help!
creator: hommealone
